name: wsPublish
description: Sends messages to a specific channel based on the filter criteria (which is a struct).

params.name: channel
params.description: Specific channel to which the server publishes its response.

params.name: message
params.description: Response sent by the server to all clients subscribed to a specific channel.

params.name: filterCriteria
params.description: Conditions to filter eligible clients that need to be notified for a given channel.

examples.title: Tag Syntax
examples.description: Checking to see if the region is present in the cache
examples.code:
<cfscript> 
 if(isDefined('form.publish')) 
 wsPublish(#form.channel#, #form.message#); 
 </cfscript> 
 <cfform method='post'> 
 <cfselect name='channel'> 
 <option> 
 stocks 
 </option> 
 <option> 
 news 
 </option> 
 <option> 
 products 
 </option> 
 </cfselect> 
 Message: 
 <input id='message' name='message' type='text'> 
 <cfinput id='publish' name='publish' value='publish' type='submit'> 
 </cfform>
